/usr/bin/c++    -O3 -Wall -fmessage-length=0 --std=c++11 -pthread -fPIC -std=c++0x -fexceptions -frtti -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections   CMakeFiles/sample_slam_tutorial_1_gui.dir/cpp/main.cpp.o  -o sample_slam_tutorial_1_gui  -L/usr/local/lib -rdynamic -lrealsense_image -lrealsense_lrs_image -lrealsense_playback -lrealsense -lpthread -lrealsense_slam -lSP_Core -ltracker -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_core -lopencv_core -lopencv_highgui -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:
